title: How to Make a Pornstar Cocktail

steps.title: Add crushed ice to a cocktail shaker.
steps.content: Add crushed ice to a cocktail shaker. Fill it about halfway with ice.

steps.title: Measure and pour the ingredients into the shaker.
steps.content: Measure and pour the ingredients into the shaker.

steps.title: Shake the contents.
steps.content: Shake the contents. Secure the lid on and vigorously shake it for a few seconds. You will know when the contents are cold when you see condensation building up on the outside of the shaker.

steps.title: Strain the contents.
steps.content: Strain the contents. Attach a strainer on the cocktail shaker (if the shaker doesn't have one) and strain it into a shot glass.

steps.title: Add crushed ice to a cocktail shaker.
steps.content: Add crushed ice to a cocktail shaker. Fill it about halfway with ice.

steps.title: Measure and pour the ingredients into the shaker.
steps.content: Measure and pour the ingredients into the shaker.

steps.title: Stir the drink.
steps.content: Stir the drink. Use a long cocktail stirrer to combine everything together.

steps.title: Strain the contents.
steps.content: Strain the contents. Attach a strainer on the cocktail shaker (if the shaker doesn't have one) and strain it into a highball glass.

steps.title: Prepare a beer mug.
steps.content: Prepare a beer mug. Measure the juice and 7-up and add it to the mug.

steps.title: Prepare a shot glass.
steps.content: Prepare a shot glass. Measure equal parts of the pucker and blue curacao into the glass.

steps.title: Drop the shot glass into the beer mug.
steps.content: Drop the shot glass into the beer mug.
